scripts.restart-db: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.restart-validator: pnpm restart-db && pnpm wait-for-db && pnpm migrate-db && pnpm start-validator
scripts.test: RUST_MIN_STACK=98388608 RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings" cargo test --package forester -- --nocapture --test-threads=1
scripts.rebuild-photon: pkill photon && cd ../../photon && cargo build && cp ./target/debug/photon ./target/debug/photon-migration ../light-protocol/.local/cargo/bin
scripts.test-10-sync: pnpm restart-validator && pnpm transfer-sync && pnpm nullify && pnpm transfer-sync && pnpm nullify && pnpm transfer-sync && pnpm nullify
scripts.test-1000: pnpm restart-validator && pnpm transfer && pnpm nullify && pnpm transfer && pnpm nullify
scripts.tnt: pnpm start-validator && pnpm transfer-sync && pnpm queue-info && pnpm nullify && pnpm queue-info && pnpm transfer-sync
